metadata.Title: CVE-2021-31162 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In the standard library in Rust before 1.52.0, a double free can occur in the Vec::from_iter function if freeing the element panics.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-31162` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libstd-rust-1.53 - 1.53.0+dfsg1+llvm-4ubuntu1~18.04.1
rust-all - 1.53.0+dfsg1+llvm-4ubuntu1~18.04.1
rust-clippy - 1.53.0+dfsg1+llvm-4ubuntu1~18.04.1
rust-gdb - 1.53.0+dfsg1+llvm-4ubuntu1~18.04.1
rust-lldb - 1.53.0+dfsg1+llvm-4ubuntu1~18.04.1
rust-src - 1.53.0+dfsg1+llvm-4ubuntu1~18.04.1
rustc - 1.53.0+dfsg1+llvm-4ubuntu1~18.04.1
rustfmt - 1.53.0+dfsg1+llvm-4ubuntu1~18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rustc package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.53.0+dfsg1+llvm-4ubuntu1~18.04.1').
